GRACE_PERIOD().notice: Grace period after expiry before writer can reclaim margin.

k().notice: Premium scale factor. Tuned so one-hour options cost ~0.001 ETH.

sweepMargin(uint256).notice: sweep remaining margin after all exercises or timeout

topUpMargin(uint256).notice: Top up margin for a specific series.  Allows writer (or anyone)         to add additional collateral if volatility spikes.

withdrawMargin(uint256).notice: Withdraw writer margin once a series is settled.         All withdrawals are subject to a `GRACE_PERIOD` after expiry         to give holders time to exercise their options.

withdrawPremium(uint256).notice: Withdraw unlocked premiums for a single series.
